entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:33 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning then changing to rain this afternoon. Snow inland. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy except snow inland early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain. Windy. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023
